forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 19C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 67F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 13C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing late. Low near 55F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 67F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low 13C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Sunday
